document.full_text: christine lagarde, the french economy minister, says it is futile to continue castigating bankers, arguing that attention should shift to making sure the banks return to financing growth.
document.title: french official calls bank 'bashing' futile
lines_and_colors: christine lagarde, the french economy minister, says it is futile to continue castigating bankers, arguing that attention should shift to making sure the banks return to financing growth.
